Look at the top five cards of your library. You may reveal a permanent card from among them and put it onto the battlefield. Put the rest on the bottom in a random order.
Target creature you control deals damage equal to its power to target creature you don't control.
Creatures you control get +X/+X and gain trample until end of turn, where X is the number of creatures you control.
